location.sjis: ディックル村 住宅地

dialogue.sjis: しゅぎょうのほうは、どうだ どれ、ボクがあいてをしてやろう
dialogue.ascii: How's your training so far? Come on, I'll be your opponent!

dialogue.sjis: また修行ね 早く、いちにんまえになりなさいね
dialogue.ascii: Still training again? You gotta becoming a full-fledged Craftknight as soon as possible!

dialogue.sjis: なんか、みんな修行、修行って 異常に鍛えまくってるみたいだけど いったい何がおもしろいのかしら
dialogue.ascii: Everyone I know talks of training nonstop! It really drives me crazy! Just what about training is fun!?
